title: 8-year-old girl wounded in Pines Village area shooting
content:
An 8-year-old girl was one of two victims in a late Saturday night (Aug. 27) shooting in the Pines Village area, New Orleans police said. A man sitting on his porch was the other victim.
According to a preliminary NOPD report, an unknown man approached the man on his porch in 4500 block of Shalimar Drive and started shooting just before 11:30 p.m. The girl who was wounded was inside the house.
Police provided no additional details on the shooting or the condition of the victims.
The double shooting took place in the 4500 block of Shalimar Drive, NOPD said.
